pkgmetadata.longdescription: # futureeditorA simple command line text-editor# Installation1) To install the futureditor package on windows pip install futureditor2) To install futureditor on mac/linux running python3 pip3 install futureditor3) To install futureditor on mac/linux running python2 pip install futureditorEven though this would work , i would recommend you to use --user.# UsageTo start future editor type```future-editor```in command line.# CreditsThis library was created by sanjay marison, please feel free contact me for any queries or any other problems,improvements to my code at marisonsanjay@gmail.com, thank you for using my code.
